messages.TRMSG_PRE_DOUBLE_BATTLE_1:
Pat: It’s a doubles team of aces!
We’re gonna overwhelm you!
messages.TRMSG_DOUBLE_BATTLE_DEFEAT_1:
Pat: You and your Pokémon will gain
power by helping each other out.
messages.TRMSG_POST_DOUBLE_BATTLE_1:
Pat: The combination of you and
your awesome Pokémon...It’s the ultimate tag team!
messages.TRMSG_DOUBLE_BATTLE_NOT_ENOUGH_POKEMON_1:
Pat: If you don’t mind, we’re hoping
for some two-on-two battle action.
messages.TRMSG_PRE_DOUBLE_BATTLE_2:
Jo: We form a combination that’s
in perfect sync!How do you expect to counter that?
messages.TRMSG_DOUBLE_BATTLE_DEFEAT_2:
Jo: You and your Pokémon make
a beautiful combination!
messages.TRMSG_POST_DOUBLE_BATTLE_2:
Jo: Yup, the way you battle is
fantastic!You should try to take the Elite Four
right now--not later!
messages.TRMSG_DOUBLE_BATTLE_NOT_ENOUGH_POKEMON_2:
Jo: We want to have a battle
without an advantage.Please come back when you have
at least two Pokémon!
